members.signatureBeforeChange: int kEventUnicodeKeyPressed (int nextHandler, int theEvent, int userData)
members.signatureAfterChange: int kEventUnicodeKeyPressed (int nextHandler, int theEvent, int userData)
diff: -			* Bug in the Macintosh (Leopard).  When focus is changed to another control
-			* when an arrow key is pressed inside of kEventUnicodeKeyPressed, when
-			* the window that contains the text control is disposed, it crashes.
-			* The fix is to avoid calling the default handler when focus changes.

members.signatureBeforeChange: int kEventUnicodeKeyPressed (int nextHandler, int theEvent, int userData)
members.signatureAfterChange: int kEventUnicodeKeyPressed (int nextHandler, int theEvent, int userData)
diff: +			* Bug in the Macintosh (Leopard).  When focus is changed to another control
+			* when an arrow key is pressed inside of kEventUnicodeKeyPressed, when
+			* the window that contains the text control is disposed, it crashes.
+			* The fix is to avoid calling the default handler when focus changes.
